import numpy as np
def heuristics_v2(el, n, w):
    deviation = (sum(el) - w) ** 2 / (w ** 2)
    deviation_factor = 0.5 * len(el) / n
    sum_el = sum(el)
    sum_el_factor = 0.3
    sum_el_term = sum_el / w
    sum_el_factor_term = 0.2
    priority = -deviation_factor * deviation - sum_el_factor * sum_el_term - sum_el_factor_term * sum_el_term
    return priority
